CustomField.formula:
IF (TEXT(Program_Grade_Level__r.Open_Application__c ) <> Null && TEXT(Program_Grade_Level__r.Open_Application__c ) = 'Active' && Text(Open_Application__c)= 'Active' && Program_Grade_Level__r.Start_Open_Application__c <= NOW() && Program_Grade_Level__r.End_Open_Application__c >= NOW(),
'Active',
IF(TEXT(Program_Grade_Level__r.Open_Application__c ) = Null && TEXT(hed__Account__r.Open_Application__c) = 'Active'&& Text(Open_Application__c)= 'Active'&& hed__Account__r.Open_Application_Start_Date__c<= NOW() && hed__Account__r.Open_Application_End_Date__c >= NOW(),'Active',
'Inactive'))
CustomField.label: Open Application Period status
